name: Crescent
description:
Controls InputOutputWASDMovementLeft ShiftRunSpaceJumpMouseLook / Turn
Right-ClickTwirl (for fun)EscapePause / In-Game Menu Gameplay Summary
  • There are two levels. The Earth stage and the Moon stage. Each stage has its own area to explore.
  • Find all the star bits in each level to complete the levels. There are a number of star bits in each level to collect and you must find them all!
Developed By Gargantua Games
  • Omar Al-Farajat — Programmer
  • Vincent Berardi — Programmer
